name: odoo
description: Odoo is an open-source suite of business apps including CRM, accounting, inventory, manufacturing, HR, and e-commerce. It can be self-hosted or used via SaaS with a powerful admin UI and thousands of modules.
features: Business Suite: Comprehensive ERP solution covering CRM, accounting, inventory, HR, and project management in one platform.
Modular Architecture: Install only needed modules from thousands of available apps to customize functionality for specific business needs.
CRM Integration: Manage leads, opportunities, and customer relationships with automated workflows and communication tracking.
Accounting System: Handle invoicing, payments, financial reporting, and tax management with multi-currency support.
Inventory Management: Track stock levels, manage warehouses, and automate procurement with barcode scanning capabilities.
E-commerce Platform: Build online stores with integrated payment processing, shipping, and inventory synchronization.
Manufacturing Tools: Plan production, manage bills of materials, and track work orders with quality control processes.
HR Management: Handle employee records, payroll, time tracking, and recruitment through integrated HR modules.
Project Management: Plan projects, track tasks, manage resources, and monitor progress with Gantt charts and reporting.
Custom Development: Extend functionality with custom modules using Python and XML development frameworks.
Multi-company Support: Manage multiple companies or subsidiaries within a single Odoo instance with shared resources.
Advanced Reporting: Generate detailed business reports and analytics with customizable dashboards and KPI tracking.
